mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_discord_account (password, username, bind_email, bind_email_password, token, params, insert_datetime, update_datetime, is_valid) VALUES (#{password}, #{username}, #{bindEmail}, #{bindEmailPassword}, #{token}, #{params}, #{insertDatetime}, #{updateDatetime}, #{isValid}) ON CONFLICT(username) DO UPDATE SET password = excluded.password, bind_email = excluded.bind_email, bind_email_password = excluded.bind_email_password, token = excluded.token, params = excluded.params, update_datetime = excluded.update_datetime;
